comments.author: Jukka Zitting
comments.body:
Package names changed in revision 389925. Merged to 1.0 in revision 389927.

I did not change the directory names to avoid unnecessary complications around 1.0, but we may want to consider doing that later on.

description: All the released projects should have artifactId's starting with "jackrabbit".
summary: Change project names to start with jackrabbit
